text: Svetlana Afanasyevna Svetlichnaya (15 May 1940 - 16 November 2024) was a Soviet and Russian actress. She was known for her role as Anna Sergeyevna in The Diamond Arm (1968). She also appeared in Anna Pavlova (1983) and Goddess: How I fell in Love (2004). She was born in present-day Gyumri, Soviet Union. Svetlichnaya died on 16 November 2024 from a long-illness in Moscow, Russia at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Soviet television actors Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Svetlana Svetlichnaya
